title: Mac苹果版：AE插件-节点式三维粒子特效插件 Stardust 1.2.1 版
author: 大众脸
content: Stardust 是AE软件新一代节点式的三维粒子插件（也称星辰粒子插件），独立的操控界面，功能强大，含多种预设，轻松制作出漂亮而复杂的效果，拥有：发射器，粒子，复制，力场，辅助发射器，3D模型，文字，Maks等控制，模式也非常多。Stardust is a modular 3D particle system for After Effects. It has an easy to use node based user interface and ships with a ton of presets to create stunning effects quickly and easily.
supported_versions: Adobe After Effects CC 2019 CC 2018, CC 2017, CC 2015.3, CC 2015.3
